images.copyright: Male mountain bluebird in Yellowstone National Park, Wyoming, USA (© Jason Savage/Tandem Stills + Motion)
images.title: Hello, harbinger of spring
images.caption: Hello, harbinger of spring
images.desc: Hello, little mountain bluebird. Although this bright fellow may be enduring the last of this year's snow in Yellowstone National Park, his presence means winter will soon be ending in the US state of Wyoming. Bluebirds are a symbol of happiness and a welcome sign of spring in many cultures.
